title: How to get untrue information off of the Internet - Quora

response.answer_text: Even if you expose them, it’s not like it’s going to do anything. If Donald Trump and religion has taught us anything, it is that despite evidence, facts, and undeniable proof, people will still choose to believe in whatever they want to believe in over the truth. All you can do is make sure that you don’t believe in stupid lies like them. And the way to do that is to do a lot of research and actually confirm something to be true rather than blindly believing in it.

Quite easily. I am exposed to untrue information off of the internet on a regular basis. It is important to be able to exercise critical thinking skills in order to avoid being taken in by the unfortunate amount of untrue information which abounds on the internet. Actually removing it is not possible as there is too much of it and more continues to appear on a regular basis.
